snippet: A C.D.C. report says the decline is one of the first significant drops in fatalities stemming from abuse of oxycodone and other prescription drugs.
abstract: Drug overdose deaths in Florida have fallen since 2010, when the state began stricter regulation of pain medication prescriptions.
lead_paragraph: A C.D.C. report says the decline is one of the first significant drops in fatalities stemming from abuse of oxycodone and other prescription drugs.

headline.main: Prescription Overdose Deaths in Florida Plunge After Tougher Measures, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Prescription Overdose Deaths in Florida Plunge After Tougher Measures, Report Says

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
